results.name: a(1) = 0, for n > 1: a(n) = a(A253889(n)) + floor((n modulo 3)/2).
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..8192
formula: a(1) = 0, for n > 1: a(n) = a(A253889(n)) + floor((n modulo 3)/2).
a(1) = 0, thereafter, if n = 3k+2, then a(3k+2) = 1 + a(k+1), otherwise a(n) = a(A253889(n)).
a(n) = A080791(A064216(n)). [Number of nonleading zeros in binary representation of terms of A064216.]
program: (Scheme, three versions, first two using memoizing definec-macro)
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Jan 23 2015
